ImR_Activator.pidl File Reference

Detailed Description

ImR_Activator.pidl,v 1.2 2002/09/25 13:14:30 jwillemsen Exp

This file was used to generate the code in ImR_Activator{C,S,S_T}.{h,i,cpp}

The command used to generate code from this file is:

tao_idl.exe -o orig -Gp -Gd -Ge 1 -Wb,export_macro=TAO_PortableServer_Export -Wb,export_include=portableserver_export.h -Wb,pre_include="ace/pre.h" -Wb,post_include="ace/post.h" ImR_Activator.pidl

after the file is generated a patch must be applied. T he patch disables the code under certain configurations, and eliminates cycles in the include dependencies. Those changes are required because the generated code is part of the TAO library, it hardly makes any sense to change the IDL compiler to support changes that are very occasional.
